description: Use this analytics platform to make strategic decisions based on solid industry data across 12,000 businesses. Base decisions on how you’re performing against similar businesses across the globe, within your region, or even in your state. Pinpoint where to open your next franchise or what services to offer.
title: Benchmarking Analytics

description: You can tailor promotions to apply to regions or even specific locations. This means you can help a new franchisee launch a new location with great specials.
title: Regional or location-level membership promotions

description: If you want incremental revenue recognition that occurs when the guest uses the service, Zenoti can make this happen regardless of which location is providing the service.
title: Flexible membership revenue recognition

business_benefits: Elevate the guest experience, unify the business
description: Members can redeem benefits across your network. So wherever they are, they know their benefits are waiting for them.
title: Cross-location membership redemptions

description: Got a pricing change you need to implement overnight? No worries. With central membership management, applying a change once releases it across your network.
title: Unified membership pricing

description: When you have multiple constraints for custom bookings, the wizard can help. Just input your parameters, then sit back while the Booking Wizard suggests optimal appointment times - faster than your best receptionist.
title: Booking wizard suggests optimal appointment times

business_benefits: Grow the business, elevate the guest experience
description: Encourage new members to join by offering promotions and introductory service pricing for first-time members for both in-store and online bookings. Then auto-convert them into regular membership programs.
title: Introductory pricing for new members

description: Need to sell a membership today that won’t start until later? You can do it with Zenoti. Close a membership sale at checkout while allowing guests to start their plans whenever they choose. Give them flexibility while making sure you don’t miss out on the sale.
title: Sell a membership today that kicks in later

description: While Zenoti memberships offer flexibility for you and your guests, you might also want to do the reverse: defining specific services that can be redeemed, in what combination, in how many sessions, and at what frequency.
title: Set which services can be redeemed, and when

description: You can pay commissions at the time the membership is sold, or at the time the service is taken. With Zenoti's unified solution, the system can grant the commission regardless of the location at which the service was used.
title: Flexible commission configuration

description: Just because a member cancels doesn’t mean you need to reimburse the balance. Allow members to gift service credits if they’re going to cancel. This strengthens the value of a membership even if they leave you. The system automatically converts unused credits to gifts that the member can award to any guest.
title: Membership cancellation doesn’t mean lost revenue

description: You can choose how you want to handle revenue recognition. You can do it instantly, at the time the membership is purchased, or handle it incrementally when the guest uses the service.
title: Flexible revenue recognition

description:
Keeping track of your great members and guests can be head-spinning, especially in busy locations like yours. But do you have a way to ensure that someone saying they’re a member … is the actual member? 

Using the POS tablet, your instructor, front desk or provider can take a picture of the member, uploading it to Zenoti. Then at check-in or check-out, your team can be 100% sure that the people you’re taking care of … are the right people.
title: Image upload with POS:  Ensure you’re taking care of actual members

description: Word of mouth is the fastest way to grow a business. You can easily incent your members to refer a friend. With Zenoti, you can award points to members only when a new guest successfully becomes a member. So they reap the rewards only after you reap the rewards.
title: Award points only for successful referrals

description: Make membership even more elite with a members-only rewards program. You can award points for retail and gift card purchases, as well as for referrals.
title: Members-only rewards program

description: Strengthen membership value even when someone leaves you. When a member cancels, the system automatically converts unused credits to gifts that the member can award to any guest.
title: Giftable service credits on membership cancellation

description: Better manage member retention with automated downgrades. As an example, you can downgrade a member to a bi-monthly membership for a 6-month period, but then auto-renew them to a monthly plan at the end of the term.
title: Automated membership downgrades

description: Make renewals nearly invisible: Auto-renews or upgrades are easy. As an example, you can sign up a guest for a Paid In Full (PIF) membership and automatically renew to a recurring membership at the end of the PIF term.
title: Automated support for upgrade to a recurring membership

description: Need to help a new franchisee launch a new location? Set up discounted memberships and limit redemption only to the location where it was sold.
title: Discounted memberships in specific locations

business_benefits: Elevate guest experience, grow the busines
description:
Your front desk is endlessly busy. While they’re juggling so many tasks, are you sure they’ll remember to offer membership upgrades? Zenoti helps you convert members who love you into members who love you more. 

Example: You’ve got 3 membership tiers: Silver, Gold and Platinum. Your gold membership includes a monthly 60-minute massage, but your member keeps returning twice each month. Zenoti helps you increase your recurring revenue while helping your member benefit, too. The product reminds both the front desk and the members that better options are available – and spares that member from paying costly extra fees.
title: Membership upgrade at check-out

description: Zenoti's unified platform creates a single guest profile, meaning that - if you allow - members can enjoy their benefits at any location in the network.
title: Members redeem benefits across your network

business_benefits: Elevate guest experience, grow the business
description: Allow your members to extend their benefits to others. Add-on members get the same privileges as members.
title: Members bring friends and family at member rates

description: With a POS system that automatically knows they're members, your guests are charged discounted member pricing for retail products - automatically.
title: Built-in member discounts for retail products

business_benefits: Streamline operations, elevate the guest experience
description: Credit cards expire. And it’s a total pain. But not for your staff or your guests.  Zenoti automatically takes care of expired credit cards, updating your system with the new card information directly from the providing bank. This keeps your guests’ booking and check-out a breeze.
title: Auto-renewal with no need to chase expired cards

description: Online, members see members-only pricing at a glance, avoiding confusion and reinforcing their great benefits.
title: Display members-only pricing online

description: Forgetful front desk? Doesn't matter! Zenoti already knows who your members are, automatically charging the appropriate discounted rates.
title: Automatic member pricing at check-out

business_benefits: Streamline operations, elevate the guest experience
description: A member wants a 120-minute massage instead of the 60-minute one covered by the membership? Not a problem. Zenoti automatically applies the correct amount at checkout. That means guests can use a 60-minute massage credit to pay for half of a 120-minute massage. Or 2/3 of a 90-minute massage. Greater flexibility means a happier clientele.
title: Smart partial credit redemptions

description: Thousands of possible combinations. One great brand. But how do you ensure everyone’s doing the same thing, every time? Zenoti’s unified solution means you can configure memberships centrally, then deploy them across your entire network auto-magically. So you get repeatable solutions with minimal training and overhead.
title: Consistent membership programs across the network

business_benefits: Streamline operations, elevate the guest experience
description: You can expand service credit replacements to all services. For example, a client with a 60-minute massage credit priced at $59.95 can use the amount to pay for a full face and arms hair removal service.
title: Redeeming membership service credits for dollar equivalents

business_benefits: Streamline operations, elevate the guest experience
description: Swapping out one service for another is no problem for members. For example, if you allow it, clients can redeem a facial against a massage credit at no additional cost.
title: Automatic membership service credit replacement

business_benefits: Streamline operations, elevate the guest experience
description: Your guests just enjoyed that facial. But did they know they could turn that one-time treat into a monthly luxury – at a lower cost? They love the service. So help guests get a discount today and moving forward. Whether they’re checking out online or at the front desk, Zenoti prompts them to become repeat customers, turning that one-time treat into a dependable revenue stream for you – and endless bliss for your guest.
title: Upsell a membership at service check-out

description: Your front desk is the face and voice of your brand. They don’t have time to doublecheck the fine print in your busy locations. Let them focus on pleasing your members. Zenoti’ll handle the nitty gritty details. Partial credits? Swapping services? Product discounts? Everything’s auto-managed by your Zenoti solution.
title: Zenoti manages all the membership details

description: Members can swap out services or credits to build solutions that suit their needs. Example, if they need a massage more than a facial, they can make a swap if you permit.
title: Exchange credits for other services

business_benefits: Streamline operations, elevate the guest experience
description: Zenoti's rich and flexible range of membership options that grows and evolves with you as your business grows and evolves. Set up memberships to match your existing programs, or design all-new, powerful memberships to reflect your emerging vision. Choose from recurring and nonrecurring, and design credit- and service-based membership combinations.
title: The most powerful & flexible membership models

description: Compare year-over-year recovery with a focus on key actions you can take to come back stronger faster than your competition.
title: Post-COVID recovery dashboard

description: Unprecedented flexibility to lay out reports to focus on metrics that matter for your business.
title: Drag and drop report configuration

description: With Zenoti, your guest profile, including encrypted card data, is available at your multi brand locations making checkout and payment effortless.
title: Single guest payment profile

description: Manage credit card disputes within Zenoti in 3 easy steps.
title: Seamless dispute mangement

description: Nail smudges and time-consuming checkouts are ancient history with Zenoti Go geo-fencing. Auto-charge (and tip!) so guests can leave on a high note.
title: Touchless checkout with Zenoti Go

description:
Auto-updating expired cards frees up your front desk, and lets your guests focus on relaxing and enjoying your brand. 

Available globally for Mastercard. Visa is available in the US and Canada.
title: Auto-update expired cards across your enterprise

description: Reduce cancellations. And if there's a no show, automatically charge fees to ease the impact on your bottom line.
title: Auto-charge no show fees

description: Forget clunky 3rd party integrations with seamless integrated payments. Automatic reconciliation saves you hours of painstaking work.
title: Integrated payments reduce your workload

description: As an additional upsell, pre-define discounts for customers who've already purchased packages. They'll watch the benefits multiply, while you keep that bottom line healthy.
title: Discounts for guests with packages

description: Design complete packages to include both products and services.
title: Product and service combo packages

business_benefits: Grow the business, elevate the guest experience
description: Craft personalized packages based on the guest's individual beauty and wellness goals. Add services or products the specific guest needs to create a tailor-made solution.
title: Create personalized packages

description: Design series packages that keep your guests coming back for more, such as buy 3 and get 2 free.
title: Flexible BOGO packages

description: Your front desk can upsell a package while checking out a guest after a service. The guest gets a quick win and you get the reliability of future visits.
title: Upsell packages at service check-out

description: Take a break. Send your front desk home. Zenoti's smart marketing uses AI (Artificial Intelligence) to trigger campaigns that fill empty appointment slots.
title: Smart marketing fills the appointment book *for* you

business_benefits: Grow the business, streamline operations, unify the business
description: Zenoti makes marketing easy with basic and themed templates, as well as giving you the tools to create completely custom mailers. Your brand. Your way.
title: Email templates flex your way

description: Flash marketing's a cinch with quick-launch campaigns you can run using built-in target settings and pre-set defaults.
title: Quick-launch campaigns

business_benefits: Grow the business, elevate the guest experience
description: Get that reluctant or forgetful online guest to commit! Abandon cart reminds guests that they're a click away from something great.
title: Follow-up and abandon cart

description: Get guests planning their next visit with discounts, cash back or loyalty points displayed right on their invoices.
title: Use your invoices to make the next sale

business_benefits: Grow the business, streamline operations, unify the business
description: Zenoti offers you the flexibility to market across your entire organization or to regionalize marketing to specific locations or zones - all the centralized power, along with the power to be unique.
title: Market your way, across your entire network or within locations or regions

business_benefits: Grow the business, streamline operations, unify the business
description:
Zenoti offers you central, smart marketing capabilities that are unparalleled in the market. 

What can’t you find anywhere else?

1.	Deeper segmentation with endless possibilities: Tailor marketing based on a guest’s behavior across your brand, not just transactions at a specific location. Examples:
    •	Anyone who’s visited the same provider more than 3 times. 
    •	Anyone who spent more than $1000, gave poor feedback in the last visit, and hasn’t revisited in more than a month
    •	Use data you collect every day in digital forms: Create segments based on tags you create for hair, skin, age or any other factors you collect in your digital forms. 
2.	Central campaign management: With one click, your campaign goes live across your entire organization. Other software makes you launch campaigns by individual locations.  
3.	Throttle messaging: We help you deploy the right number of messages to the right people at the right time. Rather than send 10,000 messages at once, Zenoti helps you send 1,000 per week. 
4.	Central reporting: View campaign performance by store or across your entire business. Open the report, click, and view how much money you made.
title: Power-packed marketing for micro-targeted segments

description: We'll get you up and running with 11 popular target segment templates. You can always add more.
title: Market to over 10 pre-defined target segments

description: From tiered discounts to gift cards, configure referral rewards as unique and compelling as your brand.
title: Design referral rewards your way

description: Referrals is a fast and easy way to grow your business, but you know it can be hard to manage and track all the ins and outs of the rewards. Zenoti is the only solution that gives you an effortless, automated way to entice your customers to bring in friends and family, then to reward them once the new guest completes a service. Throw away bulky, confusing ledgers. Trust Zenoti.
title: Refer a friend

description: Create offers that give bonuses for each gift card sold, such as offering the buyer $5 for every $100 gift card purchased.
title: Amount-based gift card promotions

description: Something for you. Something for me! Give a generous gifter something back with a promotion that offers rewards such as: buy one, get one for 15% off; or buy 2 and receive a $10 giftcard.
title: Create BOGO gift cards

description: Create gift cards for services or day packages - with or without included gratuities. Effortless giving (and receiving).
title: Service & day package gift cards

description: Need to define when or how long an e-gift can be redeemed? Zenoti automatically manages the parameters you set up - so you don't have to.
title: Set gift card duration and redemption timelines

description: Design your e-gift cards to reflect your brand's style and personality - and update them at will for seasonal or special occasion promotions.
title: Design e-gift cards your way, for your brand

description: Want to package promotional gift cards that'll build your business twice as fast? Create easy-to-sell specials such as buy one, get one 20% off. Then reap your own rewards later as the giver and the receiver happily redeem them.
title: Create gift card promotions

description: Need that special e-gift delivered at a specific time? No sweat. Guests can define exactly when they want that smile to appear on their recipient's face.
title: Timely send e-gift cards to the minute

description: Redemption's easier than ever: Just scan a gift card's barcode to apply the amount to the guest's invoice.
title: Quickly redeem physical gift cards at the front desk

description: Every part of your business should promote your great brand - right down to the look and feel of your online digital forms in Zenoti.
title: Digital forms that reflect your brand

business_benefits: Streamline operations, elevate the guest experience
description: Streamline your operations while creating a touchless, safe environment by using digital forms. Guests complete them online, ahead of arrival - keeping your reception area free and paperless.
title: Touchless digital forms

description: If one guest is booking multiple services, Zenoti can ensure they're with a single provider in a single room. Waxing, for example, may include brows and legs. So why should the guest need to change providers or rooms? Keep it simple!
title: Smart provider booking

description: Zenoti's smart booking ensures that the right rooms and equipment are available for selected services, optimizing your front desk and avoiding embarrassing mistakes.
title: Room and equipment resourcing

description: Different providers may take longer or shorter to perform a service. Or they may demand different rates. Zenoti schedules and charges accordingly - with no mistakes and no human effort required.
title: Price and time scaling

description: Automatically redirect guests to book a consultation when required. This optimizes your front desk's time and ensures your guest receives the patch test or consulting they need prior to a service.
title: Auto-block consulting time

description: Your customers love your brand, but also love their provider. If someone tries to book that special provider,  Zenoti knows how to juggle appointments to accommodate requests.  If a provider's booked by someone who didn't request her, and another guest comes along who asks for her specifically, then Zenoti will automatically assign the provider to the person asking specifically for her. You'll retain great guests - and their bonds with your staff.
title: Ensure your guest gets that special provider

description: Someone called in sick? Zenoti can't give a massage when a masseuse calls in sick. But it *can* offer options for qualified replacements and alternate appointment slots.
title: Auto-coverage for sick providers

business_benefits: Streamline operations, elevate the guest experience
description: Sometimes too much of a good thing isn't beneficial. Like getting an injectable too soon, or booking waxing before the hair regrows. Set your rebooking rules to prevent guests from coming back too fast - and skip the wasted time and guest disappointment.
title: Set default rebooking frequency

description: A smart front desk knows how to combine your offerings so there’s no duplication or lost time. Zenoti also knows how to do this, combining segments and removing duplicates to right-size the duration. So, if you’ve got 2 separate services that each have a blowdry, individually the services will take longer. Not with Zenoti, which compiles the appointments to the right services and right duration.
title: Eliminate duplicated services while booking

description: Your fully and deeply branded online experience extends your store well beyond its doors.
title: Your brand - online and in store

description: Your service menu doubles as a web interface, allowing guests to scroll through your brand and check out in just 2-4 taps.
title: Service-to-checkout simplicity

description: Coaching new providers is a cinch. After observing a service, educators easily enter ratings right into the appointment book.
title: Rate and coach students

business_benefits: Streamline operations, elevate the guest experience
description: Email a reminder one day and follow up with a text the next. Your guest will never forget an appointment again!
title: Multi-channel appointment reminders

description: Extend your brand online with your custom, whitelabeled URL for a seamless guest experience.
title: Your brand, your URL

description: Empower your guests to self serve - all while helping your business grow. Guests log in to view gift card balances, loyalty points, past purchases, membership statuses, appointments or to refer friends.
title: Guests get at-a-glance profile snapshot online
